nodes.text: The IR-3K Cloaked Guard Droid was a model of humanoid battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. Equipped with a blaster rifle and stealth field generator, IR-3K Guard Droids were among the forces guarding B-NK1's base in the back room of the Dealer's Den cantina on Coruscant.

IR-3K Cloaked Guard Droids appear as enemies in the Republic macrobinoculars mission "The Shroud's Gambit" in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
